mapper.select: select id, type, name, english_name, former_name, image, country, province_code, city_code, district_code, graduate_school, job_post, job_title, diploma, research_field, introduce, birth_time, create_time, update_time, del_flag from meta_figure where id = #{id} and del_flag = 0
mapper.insert: insert into meta_figure(type, name, english_name, former_name, image, country, province_code, city_code, district_code, graduate_school, job_post, job_title, diploma, research_field, introduce, birth_time, create_time, update_time, del_flag) values (#{type}, #{name}, #{englishName}, #{formerName}, #{image}, #{country}, #{provinceCode}, #{cityCode}, #{districtCode}, #{graduateSchool}, #{jobPost}, #{jobTitle}, #{diploma}, #{researchField}, #{introduce}, #{birthTime}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{delFlag})

insert into meta_figure(type, name, english_name, former_name, image, country, province_code, city_code, district_code, graduate_school, job_post, job_title, diploma, research_field, introduce, birth_time, create_time, update_time, del_flag) values
(#{entity.type}, #{entity.name}, #{entity.englishName}, #{entity.formerName}, #{entity.image}, #{entity.country}, #{entity.provinceCode}, #{entity.cityCode}, #{entity.districtCode}, #{entity.graduateSchool}, #{entity.jobPost}, #{entity.jobTitle}, #{entity.diploma}, #{entity.researchField}, #{entity.introduce}, #{entity.birthTime}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.delFlag})

insert into meta_figure(type, name, english_name, former_name, image, country, province_code, city_code, district_code, graduate_school, job_post, job_title, diploma, research_field, introduce, birth_time, create_time, update_time, del_flag) values
(#{entity.type}, #{entity.name}, #{entity.englishName}, #{entity.formerName}, #{entity.image}, #{entity.country}, #{entity.provinceCode}, #{entity.cityCode}, #{entity.districtCode}, #{entity.graduateSchool}, #{entity.jobPost}, #{entity.jobTitle}, #{entity.diploma}, #{entity.researchField}, #{entity.introduce}, #{entity.birthTime}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.delFlag})
on duplicate key update type = values(type), name = values(name), english_name = values(english_name), former_name = values(former_name), image = values(image), country = values(country), province_code = values(province_code), city_code = values(city_code), district_code = values(district_code), graduate_school = values(graduate_school), job_post = values(job_post), job_title = values(job_title), diploma = values(diploma), research_field = values(research_field), introduce = values(introduce), birth_time = values(birth_time), create_time = values(create_time), update_time = values(update_time), del_flag = values(del_flag)
mapper.update:
update meta_figure
type = #{type},
name = #{name},
english_name = #{englishName},
former_name = #{formerName},
image = #{image},
country = #{country},
province_code = #{provinceCode},
city_code = #{cityCode},
district_code = #{districtCode},
graduate_school = #{graduateSchool},
job_post = #{jobPost},
job_title = #{jobTitle},
diploma = #{diploma},
research_field = #{researchField},
introduce = #{introduce},
birth_time = #{birthTime},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
del_flag = #{delFlag},
where id = #{id}
mapper.delete: update meta_figure set del_flag = 1 where id = #{id}
